05E2766D.AffixDesc_Magic: Monsters deal an additional 15% of their Physical damage dealt as Burning over 5 seconds.

65099C16.AffixDesc_Rare: Monsters deal an additional 22% of their Physical damage dealt as Burning over 5 seconds.

BA17B427.AffixDesc_Legendary: Monsters deal an additional 30% of their Physical damage dealt as Burning over 5 seconds.
